mapper.select: select distinct i.name, i.scope, i.goal, i.requirement, i.project_id, t.project_name, i.item_id, t.item_name from inspection_template i, tech_project t where (role_id = #{roleId} or (scope = 2 and i.department_id = #{departmentId}) or scope = 3) and i.project_id = t.project_id and i.item_id = t.item_id
select distinct name, role_id as roleId, scope from inspection_template where role_id = #{roleId} or (scope = 2 and department_id = #{departmentId}) or scope = 3

select distinct i.goal, i.requirement, t.project_name, i.project_id, d.id as department_id, d.name as department_name from inspection_template i, tech_project t, department d where i.role_id = #{roleId} and i.name = #{name} and i.project_id = t.project_id and i.item_id = t.item_id and t.department_id = d.id
